http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/TTO/00035706/Signed  Prodoc- Terminals Phase Out Management Plan for CFC in Trinidad and Tobago project.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The Terminal Phase-out Management Plan (TPMP) for Chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs) project seeks to reduce usage of CFCs in Trinidad and Tobago to zero by January 2008 through technology transfer, training, technical and policy support components.

projects.project_descr: The TPMP for CFCs in T&T covers the period 2003 to 2008 with zero consumption of CFC targeted by January 1, 2008.  The TPMP will ensure timely sustainable and cost-effective phase-out of CFCs
